sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
widens
, postane večje od ene strani ali roba do drugega.

seg.quote: Sandy stared at me, his eyes widening.
The original trail had been widened.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
widens
, postane večje po razponu, velikosti ali raznolikosti ali vpliva na večje število oseb ali stvari.

seg.quote: The gap between the rich and poor regions widened.
Labour had to widen its appeal if it was to win the election.
They could widen their experience by going on a course.
